dc_description_s: This point shapefile represents Ferrous Metal Processing Plants of New York State for 1997. This data set includes ferrous metal processing plants in the United States. The data represent commodities covered by the Minerals Information Team (MIT) of the U.S. Geological Survey, and the companies are those considered active in 1997 and surveyed by the MIT. These data are intended for geographic display and analysis at the national level, and for large regional areas. The data should be displayed and analyzed at scales appropriate for 1:2,000,000-scale data. No responsibility is assumed by the U.S. Geological Survey in the use of these data.
dc_title_s: Ferrous Metal Processing Plants, New York State, 1997
dct_spatial_sm: New York State, New York, United States
